content.prompt: In context, the second sentence of the fourth paragraph (“I walk with a limp”) serves which of the following functions?

choices.label: It encourages the audience to identify with the author.
It introduces the exigence that inspired the author to write the passage.
It qualifies a statement by limiting its applicability.
It elaborates on a term to avoid a potential misunderstanding.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
